text: Awesome customer loyalty!! We order from here almost once a week if not more and they always get our order correct and are quick and efficient!! Today we called in and Brad picked up our tab and thanked us for being loyal customers. You …More

text: Wasn't very good. Service was nice but slow. It is closed down now.

text: Not happy. We walked in and they acknowledged us, told us to have a seat. A few minutes later some other people sit down. They take their order first and bring their drinks before we ever got  menus or our drinks. They were not busy at all. …More

text: Not very busy at all. Staff was friendly and pizza was very good
